title: Nine Inch Nails - Ghosts 1-38 Multi-Track Files
description:
These are the multi-track files for Nine Inch Nails&#039; Ghosts 1-38, in ZIP form, as were included on the DVD that came along with my Limited Edition version of the album.

My upload speed is not the best, but I haven&#039;t seen these up yet. Anyone else who gets these physically, please help seed! They are just the ZIP files in a folder.

Share your remixes!

remix.nin.com - The Official Site (No samples other than NIN)
ninremixes.com - Unofficial, but allows samples from other works
